messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://dvyukov%40google.com@code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/12851043/diff/3002/doc/go1.2.txt

https://codereview.appspot.com/12851043/diff/3002/doc/go1.2.txt#newcode9
doc/go1.2.txt:9: Please keep the list sorted (as in sort.Strings of the lines).
(see below)

Performance:

<put it here>

https://codereview.appspot.com/12851043/diff/3002/doc/go1.2.txt#newcode41
doc/go1.2.txt:41: net: improve windows performance by up to 30% (CL 8670044).
this isn't an API change (is it?) so it doesn't need to be in this list. perhaps move it to the top of the doc so it's singled out in the performance section.

On 2013/08/13 12:37:14, r wrote:

Done
